battleInfo: Battle - your post will be put up against another post. Whoever has the most votes wins!
postInfo: Post - can be seen by only your followers
geopostInfo: Geopost - can be seen by all users in a radius chosen by you from your current location (Coming soon)
battleOverlayInfo: It is forbidden to show follow codes or any form of connection to the poster outside of Anomot
geopostOverlayInfo1: The post will be shown in
geopostOverlayInfo2: metre radius from your current location
textPostReq: Text post must be at least 50 symbols
successMessageP: Success! Expect to see your post any second!
successMessageB: Success! Be aware, the battle will begin at any moment!
appealNsfwInfo: If you think that your post is wrongly marked as NSFW, you can appeal to an admin.
linkMax: The link must be below 2000 characters
linkHttp: The link must be HTTP or HTTPS
linkCouldNotBeUploaded: The link could not be validate. Check if it is correct again.
